column4: is anyone who is knowledgeable about the differences between Ubuntu 32 and 64 bit willing to join me in a privet chat, I have Dell on another chat and I am trying to work out some hardware configurations on a system I am trying to order
ubuntu 64 the .iso is something something 'amd64' does that denote that it is AMD processors only and not any intel?
so a duel Intel xeon E5405 system should handle Ubuntu 64 just fine?
